Segment.name: F07
Segment.comment: To itemize extent of automotive loss or damage

Field.name: AssignedNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

Field.name: Quantity
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: ProductServiceId
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: PartName
Field.comment: Name of the part(s) replaced

Field.name: Amount
Field.comment: Monetary amount

Field.name: DamageAreaCode1
Field.comment: Code representing the location on the vehicle where the damage was repaired

Field.name: DamageTypeCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of damage

Field.name: DamageSeverityCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating the severity of the damage

Field.name: LaborOperationIdentifier
Field.comment: Identifier representing the labor operation performed in repairing damage

Field.name: FreeFormDescription
Field.comment: Free-form descriptive text

Field.name: LaborHours1
Field.comment: Labor hours

Field.name: LaborHours2
Field.comment: Labor hours

Field.name: TotalLaborCost
Field.comment: Labor cost utilized in repair of the damage. Equal to the sum of the two labor hour data elements multiplied by the appropriate labor rate

Field.name: TotalMiscellaneousCosts
Field.comment: Sum of costs for all miscellaneous items not covered by labor and parts costs

Field.name: TotalRepairCost
Field.comment: Total cost of repair for the line item of damage, equal to the sum of part cost, total labor and total miscellaneous cost

Field.name: AuthorizationIdentification
Field.comment: Identifier representing authorization of an unusual repair or some attendant condition

Field.name: InspectionLocationTypeCode
Field.comment: Code to define the location where a type of inspection is performed

Field.name: DamageAreaCode2
Field.comment: Code representing the location on the vehicle where the damage was repaired

Field.name: DamageTypeCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of damage

Field.name: DamageSeverityCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating the severity of the damage

Field.name: DeclineAmendReasonCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the reason for declination or amendment

Field.name: ChargeAllowanceQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating reason for charge or allowance
